scripts.test: npm run drop:test && npm run create:test && jest --coverage
scripts.create:test: cd sequelize && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:migrate  && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20221118144335-orderInfo.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.drop:test: cd sequelize && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:drop
